fields.name: Potatoes
fields.description: Store in a cool, dark, dry and well-ventilated place (temperature between 7 and 10 ºC) for up to 4 months or at room temperature for up to 1 week. You can cook them in the oven or in the pan.

fields.name: Pumpkins
fields.description: Different kinds of squash depending on the production. Can be cooked in soup, puree, vegetable pan, etc.

fields.name: Radish
fields.description: The radish is the first fresh vegetable of the year. An exceptional taste, a little spicy but not too much. To be eaten plain or with a touch of salted butter.

fields.name: Onions
fields.description: Onions are a must in most of your dishes. It keeps very well protected from moisture.

fields.name: Artichokes
fields.description: Raw or cooked, the purple artichoke is eaten whole. The artichoke can also be eaten stuffed. A great green vegetable for spring.

fields.name: Tomatoes
fields.description: Tomatoes are the queens of summer. Different kinds are offered. They can be eaten with delight in salads, gazpacho or cooked.

fields.name: Green Beans
fields.description: Green beans can be eaten as a salad, in a pan, hot or cold, they are the stars of spring.

fields.name: Cauliflower
fields.description: White cauliflower can be stored in the bottom of the refrigerator. Its weight is about 1,5kg to 2kg.

fields.name: Carrots
fields.description: The carrots are washed. In the refrigerator they remain firm for 1 week.

fields.name: Spinach
fields.description: A great spring green vegetable! Ultra fresh, they will be harvested the day of shipping, so the day before your delivery.

fields.name: Salad
fields.description: Lettuce is the best known of all salads. If you don't eat it quickly, you can always put it in a fresh bag in your refrigerator's crisper.

fields.name: Mint
fields.description: Mint sold in fresh bouquet. Very strong in menthol. It is consumed in syrup, in herbal tea, chopped in a salad or a cooked dish to bring back freshness.

fields.name: Basil
fields.description: Basil is an herbaceous plant used as a flavouring in cooking. Its fragrant flavor is characteristic of Italian and Thai dishes.

fields.name: Coriander
fields.description: Fresh coriander reveals all the flavors of the Mediterranean. Refreshing and aromatic, it allows you to give another dimension to your cooking: soup, salad, meats...

fields.name: Rosemary
fields.description: In its original packaging, at the bottom of the refrigerator, fresh rosemary can be kept for about ten days. Ideal to give a fresh and aromatic dimension to your culinary preparations.

fields.name: Cranberries
fields.description: Ideal for your jams, your pies, or simply to taste as they are.

fields.name: Raspberries
fields.description: Ideal for your jams, your pies, or simply to taste as they are.

fields.name: Strawberries
fields.description: Depending on the ripening of the varieties at the farm and the progress of the season, you will be able to taste Gariguette, Mariguette, magnum or mara des Bois strawberries. Upon receipt, you can keep them for 2-3 days in the bottom of your refrigerator (ideal temperature 8°). Take them out 2-3 hours at room temperature before tasting them.

fields.name: Cherries
fields.description: Cherries are the queen of fruits. They can be eaten as is or in clafoutis.

fields.name: Green Apples
fields.description: It is a variety of tasting with a high sugar content. It has a good capacity of conservation.

fields.name: Apples
fields.description: Its main purpose is cooking but it can also be eaten as is. It has a good conservation capacity.

fields.name: Pears
fields.description: Its skin is firm and its flesh is more or less tender according to the stage of maturity at which it is consumed.

fields.name: Rhubarb
fields.description: Ideal for your desserts (pie, raspberry/rhubarb crumble) or in jams.

fields.name: Honey
fields.description: The honey we offer is produced by a neighboring beekeeper (about 10km from the farm). The assurance of a real natural honey.

fields.name: Canneds Vegetables
fields.description: Lacto-fermented vegetables (carrots + cabbage). To be eaten as is in salads, quiches or vegetables pan.

fields.name: Strawberry Jam
fields.description: A home-made jam, the simplest possible but also the best. Sugar and fruit, nothing more.

fields.name: Eggs
fields.description: Box of 12 eggs.

fields.name: Hops
fields.description: Hops can be cooked in risotto, with a soft-boiled egg or in a savory cake. It can also be brewed to relieve menopausal disorders, prevent dental plaque, cavities and gum inflammation, treat agitation or anxiety.

fields.name: Sunflower
fields.description: Sunflower in pot.

fields.name: Sunflower seeds
fields.description: Their richness in omega 6 essential fatty acids, interesting fats in the cardiovascular prevention allows the decrease of bad cholesterol levels. Action also favored by the presence of fibers which trap the food cholesterol.

fields.name: Sowing
fields.description: Plan of tomatoes in a pot

fields.name: Beans
fields.description: The bean's fibers regulate intestinal transit, cholesterol levels and blood sugar levels. Rich in vitamin B9, it contributes to the proper functioning of the nervous system and the immune system.

fields.name: Mungo
fields.description: The mungo bean would contribute to the prevention of cardiovascular diseases. Also beneficial for the intestinal flora, it is easy to prepare and leaves us full.

fields.name: Chickpeas
fields.description: Chickpea is rich in fiber and very low in fat and contains no cholesterol. It provides nearly 19 g of protein per 100 g. To avoid digestive disorders (flatulence), rinse peas thoroughly before soaking and do not use the soaking water for cooking.

fields.name: Yellow Lentils
fields.description: Rich in protein and fiber. Very digestible. The yellow lentil has a high nutritional value. Quick cooking in 15 minutes, without soaking.

fields.name: Coral Lentils
fields.description: Rich in protein and fiber. Sweeter taste than classic lentils, and a beautiful orange color. Very digestible. The coral lentil has a high nutritional value. Quick cooking in 7 minutes, without soaking.
